___PayloadIdentifier.description: A unique identifier for the payload, dot-delimited. Usually root PayloadIdentifier+subidentifier

___PayloadType.description: The type of the payload, a reverse dns string

___PayloadOrganization.description: This value describes the issuing organization of the profile, as displayed to the user

___BundleIdentifier.description: Bundle identifier of the target app

___SoundsEnabled.description: Whether sounds are allowed for this app.

___AlertType.description: The type of alert for notifications for this app. None/Banner/Alert

___BadgesEnabled.description: Whether badges are allowed for this app.

___ShowInNotificationCenter.description: Whether notifications can be shown in notification center.

___NotificationsEnabled.description: Whether notifications are allowed for this app.

___ShowInLockScreen.description: Whether notifications can be shown in the lock screen.

___PayloadVersion.description: The version of the whole configuration profile.
